name: Illustrated Hero Headers by Blush
description:
Use this UI Kit template as a starting point for your next website. What's best? It uses the Blush illustrations from "Amigos"


Complete UI Kit

  • Basic components
  • Controls like Buttons, switches, checkboxes
  • Color Palettes
  • Text Styles
  • Hero Section Templates
  • Card Components
  • Everything perfectly organized using auto layout!


Edit the illustrations!

All the illustrations in this project were made with Blush, which means that you can customize them however you want using the Blush plugin!


Get the plugin

To get the best out of this collection, install the Blush plugin and edit all the doodles.
